question: Which Indian sportsperson has won the Girls title in the IBSF World Under-16 Snooker Championships 2018?
explanation: Keerthana Pandian from India has won the girls\' title in the IBSF World Under-16 Snooker Championships by defeating Belarussian rival Albina Leschuk 3-1 in the final. Itâ€™s her first  international crown. In the corresponding boys category, Ben Martens of Belgium clinched the title in St Petersburg, Russia, according to information received from the media cell of International Billiards & Snooker Federation (IBSF).
